ModMetaData.name: Roofminer
ModMetaData.author: Sparr
ModMetaData.description:
V0.2
This mod lets you designate all connected tiles of the same roof thickness to be mined.
Thanks to Toasteh & Ogliss & the previous developers of Veinminer which this mod is based on.
Source: http://github.com/sparr/rimworldmod-Roofminer
